protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the attachment of serine to tRNA(Ser). Is also able to aminoacylate tRNA(Sec) with serine, to form the misacylated tRNA L-seryl-tRNA(Sec), which will be further converted into selenocysteinyl-tRNA(Sec) (By similarity).

go_class.description: ligase activity, forming aminoacyl-trna and related compounds

reference.reference_text: Yokogawa T, Shimada N, Takeuchi N, Benkowski L, Suzuki T, Omori A, Ueda T, Nishikawa K, Spremulli LL, Watanabe K: Characterization and tRNA recognition of mammalian mitochondrial seryl-tRNA synthetase. J Biol Chem. 2000 Jun 30;275(26):19913-20.
